casebody.data:
RL REGI NORTH CAROLINA, LLC, Plaintiff,
v.
LIGHTHOUSE COVE, LLC, Lighthouse Cove Development Corp., Inc., Glen C. Stygar, John R. Lancaster, Leticia S. Lancaster, Lionel L. Yow, and Connie S. Yow, Defendants. No. COA15-641. Court of Appeals of North Carolina. March 1, 2016.

Case Reported Without Published Opinion

Affirmed.
